mapper.select: SELECT task.id,task_group.name AS taskGroupName, longitude, latitude, status,task.remark FROM task INNER JOIN task_group ON task.taskGroupId=task_group.id

SELECT id,taskGroupName,longitude,latitude,status,remark FROM (SELECT task.id, task.taskGroupId, name as taskGroupName,longitude,latitude,status,remark FROM task,(SELECT task.id, name FROM task , task_group WHERE task.taskGroupId = task_group.id )AS idToName WHERE task.id = idToName.id)AS allTask WHERE allTask.taskGroupId=#{id}

SELECT id,taskGroupName,longitude,latitude,status,remark FROM (SELECT task.id,task.taskGroupId, name AS taskGroupName, longitude,latitude,status,remark FROM task, (SELECT task.id, name FROM task , task_group WHERE task.taskGroupId = task_group.id) AS idToName WHERE task.id = idToName.id) AS allTask WHERE allTask.taskGroupName LIKE "%"#{name}"%"

SELECT id,taskGroupName,longitude,latitude,status,remark FROM (SELECT task.id,task.taskGroupId, name AS taskGroupName, longitude,latitude,status,remark FROM task, (SELECT task.id, name FROM task , task_group WHERE task.taskGroupId = task_group.id) AS idToName WHERE task.id = idToName.id) AS allTask WHERE allTask.status = #{status}
